compatibility.notes: LGPL-2.0-or-later allows linking with proprietary software under certain conditions, especially when dynamically linked. Static linking may impose stricter requirements.

key_requirements: Ensure that recipients receive the same rights you received.
Make sure to include the license and copyright notice in all copies or substantial portions of the library.
Provide a copy of the license when distributing the library or derivative works.
license.name: LGPL-2.0-or-later
obligations: Distribute copies of the library with the same rights granted to you.
Provide access to the source code when distributing the library.
Provide complete object files to allow relinking with modified versions of the library.
Include a copy of the LGPL license with any distribution.
State any changes made to the library when distributing modified versions.
